mapper.select: SELECT id, title, DATE_FORMAT(start1, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') start1, DATE_FORMAT(end1, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') end1, ALLDAY, TEXTCOLOR, BACKGROUNDCOLOR, BORDERCOLOR FROM calendar
mapper.insert: insert into calendar (title, start1, end1, allDay, textColor, backgroundColor, borderColor) values(#{title}, #{start1}, #{end1}, 1, 'yellow', 'navy', 'navy')
